meanings.definition: FedExes: sends or delivers packages using the FedEx company
meanings.sent1: She fedexes the important documents to clients every week.
meanings.sent2: He always fedexes his online orders to ensure quick delivery.
meanings.sent3: The cat fedexes the toy mouse to its owner as a playful gesture.
meanings.sent4: Time fedexes memories to the future, delivering them when least expected.
meanings.sent5: The sun fedexes warmth to the earth, brightening our days.

meanings.definition: FedExes: the act of sending or delivering packages using the FedEx company
meanings.sent1: The frequent fedexes of packages make the office busy.
meanings.sent2: We rely on the fedexes for our business to run smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected fedexes of gifts brought joy to the family.
meanings.sent4: Hope arrives in small fedexes, carrying promises of better days.
meanings.sent5: The constant fedexes of goods keep the economy moving forward.
